Html:
Hi,
this is Microsoft's UIA UIA Verify.

The first version works exactly over the same .NET 3.0+ as UIAutomaiton cmdlets work.
The second version that works over UIA COM wrapper has been removed and, as promised, is placed to a Windows SDK.

UIAutomationSpy also has a simple UIAutomation tree on one of tabs, however, UIA Verify is more useful when you need an overview of what you are testing.
